EscolhaCategoria: Choose one of the categories below and save
text01: As soon as a product reaches an expiration date, it can be registered on our platform via the market.
text02: Once the product is registered, it will be available in the products tab, in the initial search bar, or in categories at the beginning of the site.
text03: It's very simple, first you register on our platform, and you will be directed to the product page, where you can choose the bargains you want, and add to the cart. After adding all the desired items, you will go to the payment area, and that's it, bargain guaranteed!
texto04: When buying the product through the platform, the establishment will reserve your bargain, which can be picked up in person at the market or grocery store.
slogan01: We fight waste and still make a difference in your pocket!
O QUE ESTÃO COMENTANDO SOBRE A: WHAT ARE THEY SAYING ABOUT THE
Comentario01: The platform is very good! I found it very easy to use and intuitive, I'm already buying it every week!
Comentario02: After I found out, I never stopped buying. I've already recommended it to everyone here at home!
